communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

The Personal History Files (record schedule 90001) and Employee Summary Service Records (record schedule 90002) for the following active Department of Corrections and Community Supervision (DOCCS) civil service empolyees:

- Ahearn, Kelly
- Albino, Jacqueline
- Ayotte, Darren
- Byrnes, Judith
- Dawson, Jerome
- Fosmire, BobbyJoe
- Lebel, Kenneth
- Martuscello, Catherine
- Martuscello, Christopher
- Martuscello, Daniel F III
- Martuscello, Nicholas
- Meigs, Charlotte
- Miller, Mark
- Nunez, Christian

The Personal History Files (record schedule 90001) and Employee Summary Service Records (record schedule 90002) for the following former Department of Corrections and Community Supervision civil service empolyees:

- Cianfrocco, Louis
- Ferro, James
- Fonda, Vernon
- Marra, Stephen
- Martuscello, Daniel F Jr (likely in the system as Daniel F Martuscello)
- Martuscello, Victoria

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Gelardi
